lexUnit.name: horn.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a hard permanent outgrowth of bone encased in hardened skin, often curved and pointed, found in pairs on the heads of cattle, sheep, and other animals

sentence.text: The warriors hurled themselves at the heads or horns of their animals to make them lie down .
